name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in software development, specializing in **Linux**, **C**, **C++**, and **Qt** technologies. Proficient in leveraging tools such as **Bash** for scripting and **Jira** for effective project management. I bring a robust background in designing and implementing efficient systems that support scalable applications. 
Beyond my core technical skills, I have a proven track record in developing high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. My experience includes full-stack development utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, along with advanced frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. 
I also possess deep cloud expertise in **Azure** and **AWS**, alongside my knowledge of microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My hands-on experience extends to developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows with technologies such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
